name: The Free Word Search Game
description:
Welcome to a wild, wonderful, free word search game! The Free Word Search Game is a classic word search guaranteed to entertain even the greatest of minds. This fantastic mobile app game is perfect for people of all ages. Not only is it fun to play, but with 25 different word lists, also educational. Strengthen your spelling skills, vocabulary, and word identification while you have a blast!

Some of the word lists that are available in this word search game are animals, birds, boys and girls names, and even educational lists such financial terms and parts of the body!

Unlike other word search games, this game does not use offensive words. If you ever get stuck, don't worry! This word search game has a built-in hint button to keep you moving.
